channel.title: competition on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in competition on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: E-commerce Rules amendments: Protects consumers but lacks clarity
item.description: The recently proposed changes to the e-commerce rules, seek to ensure consumer protection against unfair trade practices However, in a bid to create a more robust compliance mechanism, the rules run the risk of creating greater fault lines in India’s e-commerce industry.

item.title: Unpacking the positives and risks of Apple and Google’s contact tracing foray #SaveOurPrivacy
item.description: IFF’s Working Paper on Privacy Prescriptions for Technology Interventions on COVID-19 in India, affords significant space to the issue of contact tracing technologies. It offers a preliminary breakdown of the Apple and Google’s proposed partnership to provide a digital contact tracing solution.
